audioText: Les étudiants ont manifesté devant l'université pour soutenir leur professeur licencié après ses critiques du gouvernement.
question: Why did the students demonstrate in front of the university?
options: To support their professor who was fired after criticizing the government
To protest against high university fees
To demand better facilities and resources
explanation: The text states 'Les étudiants ont manifesté devant l'université pour soutenir leur professeur licencié après ses critiques du gouvernement' - The students demonstrated in front of the university to support their professor who was fired after his criticisms of the government. The verb 'soutenir' means to support or back someone.
